class.name: ta11_force_controller/TA11TrajectorySubController
class.description: A JointTrajectoryController extension that modifies execution of individual finger trajectories based on tactile sensor readings and relative finger positions.

class.name: ta11_force_controller/TA11TrajectoryRealController
class.description: A JointTrajectoryController extension that modifies execution of individual finger trajectories based on tactile sensor readings and relative finger positions. Reads TA11 tactile data.
